context.climate_notes: Participants should ensure that their medical insurance covers this type of event and country.
context.resupply_notes: There are many places along the route to replenish your supplies.
context.summary: The Race Around Rwanda is an ultra-distance cycling event covering 1000 kilometers with significant elevation gain and mixed terrain.

results.title: Race Around Rwanda – 1000km bike packing race
results.snippet: Race Around Rwanda is a self-supported event. In the spirit of bikepacking races there are no real support vehicles. However, we will have organization cars following along the route , as well as a medical team at the checkpoints, ready for dispatch in case of serious accidents.

results.title: RULES – Race Around Rwanda
results.snippet: The Race Around Rwanda is organized on public roads. It is the rider’s responsibility to know the traffic laws of the country and to obey them. Riders must use common sense when interacting with traffic.

results.title: Race Around Rwanda 2025 - BIKEPACKING.com
results.snippet: Event Website . Organizer: Race Around Rwanda Ltd. Email: info@racearoundrwanda.com. Where. Kigali.The Race around Rwanda (RaR) is an ultra endurance cycling event that leads contestants over a spectacular route around the beautiful Rwandan countryside.

results.title: Race Around Rwanda 2024 | Komoot
results.snippet: The Race Around Rwanda is a 1000km unsupported bikepacking race , starting and finishing in Kigali with four checkpoints in beautiful and diverse locations around Rwanda . The route has A LOT of climbing, and is 40% gravel.

results.title: Race Around Rwanda 2025 Tracking and Commentary - DotWatcher.cc
results.snippet: Race Around Rwanda 2025. A 1000km route through the scenery of Rwanda , with 18,000 M+, in an area known as the land of a thousand hills (Le Pays des Mille Collines), thanks to the endless ‘ups and downs’ in this stunning country.

results.title: Race around Rwanda edition 2025 | Battistrada
results.snippet: The edition Race around Rwanda 2025 took place on Sunday 02 February 2025 with departure in Kigali, Umujyi wa Kigali. Race around Rwanda is offering 1 routes (1000 km) for gravel bike.

results.title: No sleep till Kigali: Race Around Rwanda report | Cyclist
results.snippet: The Race Around Rwanda is an ultra-endurance loop of the Land of a Thousand Hills – part bikepacking odyssey, part study in sleep deprivation. Cyclist learns about freezing rain, spiders and hallucinations on the red gravel roads of Africa.

results.title: Race Around Rwanda 2024 - Rwanda Convention Bureau
results.snippet: The Race around Rwanda (RaR) is an ultra endurance cycling event that leads contestants over a spectacular route around the beautiful Rwandan countryside. It is a self supported, single stage race covering almost 1,000km and 17,000 meters of elevation gain.

context.summary: The Atlas Mountain Race is a fixed route, unsupported, single-stage cycling race that takes riders through challenging terrain in the Atlas Mountains of Morocco.

results.title: Atlas Mountain Race — The Mountain Races: Silk Road, Atlas, Hellenic
results.snippet: Race Logistics: registration, 3 staffed checkpoints, control cars, race media, medical car to liaise with local emergency services, 24/7 race HQ, team of dotwatchers. ... The Atlas Mountain Race is a serious undertaking that should not be underestimated. It takes place in an environment that can be as tough as it is beautiful.

results.title: FAQ — Atlas Mountain Race
results.snippet: The same rules apply as to solo riders but to the pair as a whole. That means no outside assistance to the pair as a whole. Sharing equipment, drafting, support, etc. is perfectly fine between the two members of the pair. Race Logistics: registration, 3 staffed checkpoints, control cars, race ...

results.title: About the Races — The Mountain Races: Silk Road, Atlas, Hellenic
results.snippet: Here are the rules that all riders must meet in order to be awarded a completion and finishing time for The Mountain Races. They are also elaborated on in greater detail in the Race Manual, which you will receive when you are accepted into our races. Ride from the designated start line to the designated finish via the route provided and the 3 staffed checkpoints listed in the Race Manual and specified on the Brevet Card

results.snippet: Find out more & sign up via atlasmountainrace.cc REGISTRATION OPENS 09/10/23 & CLOSES 27/10/23 ... Hard mountain bike ride. Very good fitness required. Advanced riding skills necessary.

results.title: The Mountain Races: Silk Road, Atlas, Hellenic
results.snippet: Snow capped peaks and lunar landscapes are criss crossed by broken roads and remote colonial pistes, setting the stage for an epic adventure through the Atlas Mountains of Morocco. With few races taking place in February, AMR has become one of our most popular races.

results.title: Atlas Mountain Race
results.snippet: WHEN: February 9 -17, 2024 WHERE: Start in Marrakech & finish in Essaouira, Morocco WHO: Racers can ride solo or as a pair DISTANCE: 1300 kilometres with 21,140m of climbing. Fixed route with 3 staffed checkpoints.
